body: the previous one was translated by fatedcircle. kinda obvious -> ([Circle Spice] Jimi dakedo Eroi Karada Shita Okaa-san o Fuuzoku Ochi Sunzen de Sukutta Boshi Soukan [English] [Fated Circle]). they also put their contact on the first page.

Well...if you read the story, it is because those are flash backs of her child's more innocent times. The kid is going through a rebellious stage, so he dyed his hair yellow, which is why the mom got tips from her friend to "cure" him by performing sexual acts on him.

Why is he blond in some panels and in others his hair is brown? 
Can I please ask for a little consistency when a kid is having incestuous sexual encounters with his mom?
